circumstances: En route, a fire erupted on board and the pilot reduced his altitude in an attempt to make an emergency landing near Dumas Lake. On touchdown, the single engine aircraft slid for several yards and came to rest in flames. Rescuers arrived on scene on March 3, 1942. While the pilot and a passenger were evacuated, the second passenger was killed.
probable_cause: An uncontained fire erupted on board in flight for undetermined reason.
